page.title: 02FARMING IN SOUTH CROXTON
page.content: One of the main forms of employment in this area is farming.Mr and Mrs Crawford own Manor farm in South Croxton which has 580 acres of land.Mr Crawford have lived in South Croxton for 45 years. Mrs Crawford has lived in South Croxton for 19 years.Since Mr Crawford has lived in South Croxton it has changed over the years.The people are younger now and the actual village has changed. For instance many of the old villagers have died. New young families now live in the village. They started farming because it was passed down through the family. On their farm, the main crop they grow is barley. The only animals they have on the farm are cows. The machinary the Crawfords have on their farm are tractors,combine harvesters,potatoe harvester,straw baler,ditchers and hedge cutters.
